00045 namespace {
00046   const uint32_t METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT = 10;
00047   const uint32_t MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH = 4;
00048 
00049   class MetaKeyBuilder {
00050   public:
00051     MetaKeyBuilder() : start(0), end(0) { return; }
00052     void
00053     build_keys(const char *format, uint32_t table_id, const char *row_key) {
00054       char *ptr;
00055       if (row_key) {
00056         start = new char [16 + strlen(row_key) + 1];
00057         sprintf(start, format, table_id);
00058         strcat(start, row_key);
00059       }
00060       else {
00061         start = new char [16];
00062         sprintf(start, format, table_id);
00063       }
00064       end = new char [16];
00065       sprintf(end, format, table_id);
00066       ptr = end + strlen(end);
00067       *ptr++ = (char)0xff;
00068       *ptr++ = (char)0xff;
00069       *ptr = 0;
00070 
00071     }
00072     ~MetaKeyBuilder() {
00073       delete [] start;
00074       delete [] end;
00075     }
00076     char *start;
00077     char *end;
00078   };
00079 }

00085 RangeLocator::RangeLocator(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr,
00086                            ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr,
00087                            Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace)
00088     : m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_mgr), m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace),
00089       m_root_stale(true), m_range_server(conn_mgr->get_comm(),
00090       HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER_CLIENT_TIMEOUT) {
00091   time_t client_timeout;
00092 
00093   if ((client_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Request.Timeout", 0)) != 0)
00094     m_range_server.set_default_timeout(client_timeout);
00095 
00096   int cache_size = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.LocationCache.MaxEntries", HYPERTABLE_LOCATIONCACHE_MAXENTRIES);
00097   m_cache_ptr = new LocationCache(cache_size);
00098 
00099   initialize();
00100 }

00122 void RangeLocator::initialize() {
00123   DynamicBuffer valbuf(0);
00124   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00125   uint64_t handle;
00126   Schema *schema = 0;
00127 
00128   m_root_handler_ptr = new RootFileHandler(this);
00129 
00130   m_root_file_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root", OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_root_handler_ptr);
00131 
00132   handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/tables/METADATA", OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback);
00133 
00134   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", valbuf);
00135 
00136   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00137 
00138   schema = Schema::new_instance((const char *)valbuf.base, valbuf.fill(), true);
00139   if (!schema->is_valid()) {
00140     delete schema;
00141     HT_ERRORF("Schema Parse Error for table METADATA : %s", schema->get_error_string());
00142     HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_SCHEMA_PARSE_ERROR, "");
00143   }
00144 
00145   m_metadata_schema_ptr = schema;
00146 
00147   m_metadata_table.name = "METADATA";
00148   m_metadata_table.id = 0;
00149   m_metadata_table.generation = schema->get_generation();
00150 
00151   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00152 
00153   if ((cf = schema->get_column_family("StartRow")) == 0) {
00154     HT_ERROR("Unable to find column family 'StartRow' in METADATA schema");
00155     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, "");
00156   }
00157   m_startrow_cid = cf->id;
00158 
00159   if ((cf = schema->get_column_family("Location")) == 0) {
00160     HT_ERROR("Unable to find column family 'Location' in METADATA schema");
00161     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, "");
00162   }
00163   m_location_cid = cf->id;
00164 }

00167 RangeLocator::~RangeLocator() {
00168   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(m_root_file_handle);
00169 }

00172 
00173 void
00174 RangeLocator::find_loop(TableIdentifier *table, const char *row_key,
00175     RangeLocationInfo *rane_loc_infop, Timer &timer, bool hard) {
00176   int error;
00177   double wait_time = 1.0;
00178   double total_wait_time = 0.0;
00179 
00180   error = find(table, row_key, rane_loc_infop, timer, hard);
00181 
00182   if (error == Error::TABLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST) {
00183     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00184     m_last_errors.clear();
00185     HT_THROW(error, (std::string)"Table '" + table->name + "' is being dropped.");
00186   }
00187 
00188   while (error != Error::OK) {
00189 
00190     // check for timer expiration
00191     if (timer.remaining() < wait_time) {
00192       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00193       for (std::deque<std::string>::iterator iter = m_last_errors.begin(); iter != m_last_errors.end(); iter++)
00194         HT_ERRORF("%s", (*iter).c_str());
00195       m_last_errors.clear();
00196       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, (String)"Locating range for row = '" + row_key + "'");
00197     }
00198 
00199     // wait a bit
00200     poll(0, 0, (int)(wait_time*1000.0));
00201     total_wait_time += wait_time;
00202     wait_time *= 1.5;
00203 
00204     // try again
00205     if ((error = find(table, row_key, rane_loc_infop, timer, true)) == Error::TABLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST) {
00206       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00207       m_last_errors.clear();
00208       HT_THROW(error, (std::string)"Table '" + table->name + "' is being dropped.");
00209     }
00210   }
00211 
00212   {
00213     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00214     m_last_errors.clear();
00215   }
00216 }

00220 int
00221 RangeLocator::find(TableIdentifier *table, const char *row_key,
00222     RangeLocationInfo *rane_loc_infop, Timer &timer, bool hard) {
00223   RangeSpec range;
00224   ScanSpec meta_scan_spec;
00225   ScanBlock scan_block;
00226   int error;
00227   Key key;
00228   RangeLocationInfo range_loc_info;
00229   std::string start_row;
00230   std::string end_row;
00231   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00232   RowInterval ri;
00233   bool inclusive = (row_key == 0 || *row_key == 0) ? true : false;
00234 
00235   if (m_root_stale) {
00236     if ((error = read_root_location(timer)) != Error::OK)
00237       return error;
00238   }
00239 
00240   if (!hard && m_cache_ptr->lookup(table->id, row_key, rane_loc_infop))
00241     return Error::OK;
00242 
00246   if (table->id == 0 && (row_key == 0 || strcmp(row_key, Key::END_ROOT_ROW) < 0)) {
00247     rane_loc_infop->start_row = "";
00248     rane_loc_infop->end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00249     rane_loc_infop->location = m_root_range_info.location;
00250     return Error::OK;
00251   }
00252 
00255   range.start_row = 0;
00256   range.end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00257   memcpy(&addr, &m_root_addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00258 
00259   MetaKeyBuilder meta_keys;
00260   char *meta_key_ptr;
00261 
00262   if (table->id == 0)
00263     meta_keys.build_keys("%d:", 0, row_key);
00264   else
00265     meta_keys.build_keys("0:%d:", table->id, row_key);
00266 
00270   meta_key_ptr = meta_keys.start+2;
00271   if (hard ||
00272       !m_cache_ptr->lookup(0, meta_key_ptr, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00273 
00274     meta_scan_spec.row_limit = METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT;
00275     meta_scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00276     meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("StartRow");
00277     meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00278 
00279     ri.start = meta_keys.start;
00280     ri.start_inclusive = true;
00281     ri.end = 0;
00282     ri.end_inclusive = false;
00283     meta_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00284 
00285     meta_scan_spec.return_deletes = false;
00286     // meta_scan_spec.interval = ????;
00287 
00288     try {
00289       m_range_server.set_timeout((time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5));
00290       m_range_server.create_scanner(addr, m_metadata_table, range, meta_scan_spec, scan_block);
00291     }
00292     catch (Exception &e) {
00293       if (e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND)
00294         m_cache_ptr->invalidate(0, meta_keys.start);
00295       return e.code();
00296     }
00297 
00298     if ((error = process_metadata_scanblock(scan_block)) != Error::OK) {
00299       m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00300       return error;
00301     }
00302 
00303     if (!scan_block.eos()) {
00304       m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00305     }
00306 
00307     if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(0, meta_key_ptr, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00308       HT_ERRORF("Unable to find metadata for row '%s' row_key=%s",
00309                 meta_keys.start, row_key);
00310       return Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND;
00311     }
00312   }
00313 
00314   if (table->id == 0)
00315     return Error::OK;
00316 
00321   range.start_row = rane_loc_infop->start_row.c_str();
00322   range.end_row   = rane_loc_infop->end_row.c_str();
00323 
00324   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00325       rane_loc_infop->location.c_str(), addr)) {
00326     HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry for row '%s' - %s",
00327               start_row.c_str(), rane_loc_infop->location.c_str());
00328     return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00329   }
00330 
00331   meta_scan_spec.clear();
00332 
00333   meta_scan_spec.row_limit = METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT;
00334   meta_scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00335   meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("StartRow");
00336   meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00337 
00338   ri.start = meta_keys.start+2;
00339   ri.start_inclusive = true;
00340   ri.end = meta_keys.end+2;;
00341   ri.end_inclusive = true;
00342   meta_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00343 
00344   // meta_scan_spec.interval = ????;
00345 
00346   if (m_conn_manager_ptr &&
00347       !m_conn_manager_ptr->wait_for_connection(addr, (time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5))) {
00348     if (timer.expired())
00349       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "");
00350   }
00351 
00352   try {
00353     m_range_server.set_timeout((time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5));
00354     m_range_server.create_scanner(addr, m_metadata_table, range,
00355                                   meta_scan_spec, scan_block);
00356   }
00357   catch (Exception &e) {
00358     if (e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND)
00359       m_cache_ptr->invalidate(0, meta_keys.start+2);
00360     return e.code();
00361   }
00362 
00363   if ((error = process_metadata_scanblock(scan_block)) != Error::OK) {
00364     m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00365     return error;
00366   }
00367 
00368   if (!scan_block.eos()) {
00369     m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00370   }
00371 
00372   if (row_key == 0)
00373     row_key = "";
00374 
00375   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(table->id, row_key, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00376     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00377     m_last_errors.push_back((std::string)"RangeLocator failed to find metadata for table '" + table->name + "' row '" + row_key + "'");
00378     while (m_last_errors.size() > MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH)
00379       m_last_errors.pop_front();
00380     return Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND;
00381   }
00382 
00383   return Error::OK;
00384 }
00385 
00386 
00390 int RangeLocator::process_metadata_scanblock(ScanBlock &scan_block) {
00391   RangeLocationInfo range_loc_info;
00392   ByteString bskey;
00393   ByteString value;
00394   Key key;
00395   const char *stripped_key;
00396   uint32_t table_id = 0;
00397   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00398 
00399   range_loc_info.start_row = "";
00400   range_loc_info.end_row = "";
00401   range_loc_info.location = "";
00402 
00403   bool got_start_row = false;
00404   bool got_end_row = false;
00405   bool got_location = false;
00406 
00407   while (scan_block.next(bskey, value)) {
00408 
00409     if (!key.load(bskey)) {
00410       HT_ERRORF("METADATA lookup for '%s' returned bad key", bskey.str());
00411       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00412     }
00413 
00414     if ((stripped_key = strchr(key.row, ':')) == 0) {
00415       HT_ERRORF("Bad row key found in METADATA - '%s'", key.row);
00416       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00417     }
00418     stripped_key++;
00419 
00420     if (got_end_row) {
00421       if (strcmp(stripped_key, range_loc_info.end_row.c_str())) {
00422         if (got_start_row && got_location) {
00423 
00427           if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00428               range_loc_info.location.c_str(), addr)) {
00429             HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry for row '%s' "
00430                       "- %s", range_loc_info.end_row.c_str(),
00431                       range_loc_info.location.c_str());
00432             return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00433           }
00434           if (m_conn_manager_ptr)
00435             m_conn_manager_ptr->add(addr, 300, "RangeServer");
00436 
00437           m_cache_ptr->insert(table_id, range_loc_info);
00438           //cout << "(1) cache insert table=" << table_id << " start=" << range_loc_info.start_row << " end=" << range_loc_info.end_row << " loc=" << range_loc_info.location << endl;
00439         }
00440         else {
00441           boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00442           m_last_errors.push_back(format("Incomplete METADATA record found in "
00443               "root range under row key '%s'", range_loc_info.end_row.c_str()));
00444           while (m_last_errors.size() > MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH)
00445             m_last_errors.pop_front();
00446         }
00447         range_loc_info.start_row = "";
00448         range_loc_info.end_row = "";
00449         range_loc_info.location = "";
00450         got_start_row = false;
00451         got_end_row = false;
00452         got_location = false;
00453       }
00454     }
00455     else {
00456       table_id = (uint32_t)strtol(key.row, 0, 10);
00457       range_loc_info.end_row = stripped_key;
00458       got_end_row = true;
00459     }
00460 
00461     if (key.column_family_code == m_startrow_cid) {
00462       const uint8_t *str;
00463       size_t len = value.decode_length(&str);
00464       //cout << "TS=" << key.timestamp << endl;
00465       range_loc_info.start_row = std::string((const char *)str, len);
00466       got_start_row = true;
00467     }
00468     else if (key.column_family_code == m_location_cid) {
00469       const uint8_t *str;
00470       size_t len = value.decode_length(&str);
00471       range_loc_info.location = std::string((const char *)str, len);
00472       if (range_loc_info.location == "!")
00473         return Error::TABLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST;
00474       got_location = true;
00475     }
00476     else {
00477       HT_ERRORF("METADATA lookup on row '%s' returned incorrect column (id=%d)",
00478                 bskey.str(), key.column_family_code);
00479     }
00480   }
00481 
00482   if (got_start_row && got_end_row && got_location) {
00483 
00487     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00488         range_loc_info.location.c_str(), addr)) {
00489       HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry for row '%s' - %s",
00490           range_loc_info.end_row.c_str(), range_loc_info.location.c_str());
00491       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00492     }
00493     if (m_conn_manager_ptr)
00494       m_conn_manager_ptr->add(addr, 300, "RangeServer");
00495 
00496     m_cache_ptr->insert(table_id, range_loc_info);
00497 
00498     //cout << "(2) cache insert table=" << table_id << " start=" << range_loc_info.start_row << " end=" << range_loc_info.end_row << " loc=" << range_loc_info.location << endl;
00499   }
00500   else if (got_end_row) {
00501     HT_ERRORF("Incomplete METADATA record found in root tablet under row key "
00502               "'%s'", range_loc_info.end_row.c_str());
00503   }
00504 
00505   return Error::OK;
00506 }

00509 
00510 
00514 int RangeLocator::read_root_location(Timer &timer) {
00515   DynamicBuffer value(0);
00516   std::string addr_str;
00517 
00518   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_root_file_handle, "Location", value);
00519 
00520   m_root_range_info.start_row  = "";
00521   m_root_range_info.end_row    = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00522   m_root_range_info.location   = (const char *)value.base;
00523 
00524   m_cache_ptr->insert(0, m_root_range_info, true);
00525 
00526   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr((const char *)value.base, m_root_addr)) {
00527     HT_ERROR("Bad format of 'Location' attribute of /hypertable/root Hyperspace file");
00528     return Error::BAD_ROOT_LOCATION;
00529   }
00530 
00531   if (m_conn_manager_ptr) {
00532 
00533     m_conn_manager_ptr->add(m_root_addr, 8, "Root RangeServer");
00534 
00535     if (!m_conn_manager_ptr->wait_for_connection(m_root_addr, (time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5))) {
00536       std::string addr_str;
00537       HT_ERRORF("Timeout (20s) waiting for root RangeServer connection - %s",
00538                    InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, m_root_addr));
00539     }
00540   }
00541 
00542   m_root_stale = false;
00543 
00544   return Error::OK;
00545 }
